mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply(reply_content, member_id, board_id) values(#{replyContent}, #{memberId}, #{boardId})
mapper.select: select reply_id, reply_content, reply_register_date, reply_update_date, board_id, m.member_id, member_name from tbl_member m join tbl_reply r on board_id = #{boardId} and m.member_id = r.member_id order by reply_id desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
